jobDescription: My AccountJob Openings >> Sales Account RepresentativeSales Account RepresentativeSummaryTitle: Sales Account RepresentativeID: 1264Department: Field SalesDescription​​​​​Job SummaryThe Sales Account Representative position promotes the sale of National Mortgage Insurance (National MI) products, services and programs to customers and helps the company drive revenue growth and achieve maximum sales profitability and account penetration within an assigned territory. Through personal sales calls, email and telephone contacts, the Sales Account Representative will use a consultative selling approach to build awareness of National MI products and services and improve customer satisfaction through an enhanced knowledge of our products and services. The candidate for this position must live in the Greater Chicago Area.
